name: The Necromancer
description:
Welcome to the graveyard !

It's time for you to practice some dark magic !

Swap between two characters . The first one is digging for bones and throws them in the well. When five bones are on the altar, below in the crypt, the necromancer can perform the ritual !

But beware ! A hunter is out too, looking for you! Hide to avoid getting shot ! And below, in the crypt, a ghoul smelled fresh bones, and want them for dinner ! Protect the bones !

Will the dark forces be pleased by your sacrifices ?

Perform a ritual to score 10 pts !

Controls :

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • X to dig and throw bones with igor / perform the ritual with the necromancer
  • C to hide in the ground with igor / throw a fireball with the necromancer
  • S to swap between the two characters
  • F to toggle fullscreen

This game was made for an during MyFirstGameJam Winter 2019, between the 4th and the 16th of February. It's totally perfectible, upgradable and buggy here and there . PLEASE comment on the game and concept, and report the bugs to help me improve the game ! I'll try to update it when (if) possible ! Have fun :)
